name: UPI Chem - Phytosterol 95 MIN
description: UPI Chem is a high-purity chemicals supplier offering PHYTOSTEROL 95 MIN with 95% minimum purity. Their plant-derived sterols provide exceptional quality and efficacy as cholesterol alternatives for barrier repair, anti-inflammatory, and moisturizing applications in cosmetic formulations.
notes: High-purity specialty chemicals supplier. PHYTOSTEROL 95 MIN offers 95% minimum purity plant-derived sterols (CAS 83-46-5). Exceptional quality compound suitable for barrier repair, anti-inflammatory, and moisturizing applications. High purity ensures consistent performance in cosmetic formulations. Ideal for premium barrier repair products requiring plant-based cholesterol alternatives with verified purity.
